source.query:
SELECT
  a.*,
  s."Sale Date",
  s."Sale Type",
  s."Sale Condition",
  s.saleprice,
  m.code AS "MS SubClass1",
  z.code AS "MS Zoning1",
  tq_kitchen.code AS "Kitchen Qual1",
  tq_exterqual.code AS "Exter Qual1",
  tq_extercond.code AS "Exter Cond1",
  tq_heatingqc.code AS "Heating QC1",
  f."Floor",
  f.bedrooms,
  f."Full Bath",
  f."Half Bath"
FROM amesdbtemp a
INNER JOIN saleproperty s
    ON a.pid = s.pid
LEFT JOIN floordetail f
    ON a.pid = f.pid
INNER JOIN mssubclass m
    ON a."MS SubClass" = m.code
INNER JOIN mszoning z
    ON a."MS Zoning" = z.id
LEFT JOIN typequality tq_kitchen
    ON a."Kitchen Qual" = tq_kitchen.id
LEFT JOIN typequality tq_exterqual
    ON a."Exter Qual" = tq_exterqual.id
LEFT JOIN typequality tq_extercond
    ON a."Exter Cond" = tq_extercond.id
LEFT JOIN typequality tq_heatingqc
    ON a."Heating QC" = tq_heatingqc.id
